snapshot.blocks.big-bang-ecosystem.copy.body: Clickeen isn't just another FAQ builder—it's the first product designed for AI operation from day one. While competitors retrofit AI features, we built an architecture that AI agents can understand, modify, and optimize autonomously.
snapshot.blocks.big-bang-ecosystem.copy.headline: Built for AI, operated by AI
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.0.body: Choose structure per breakpoint—accordion, list, or cards. Control spacing, density, and alignment so it feels native.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.0.title: Layouts
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.1.body: Radius, borders, shadows, and surfaces that match your UI language. Make it look like it shipped with your product.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.1.title: Appearance
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.2.body: Role-based type styles that keep hierarchy clean. Headings, body, labels—tuned to your brand.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.items.2.title: Typography
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.subhead: Match your site and brand without compromise.
snapshot.blocks.control-moat.copy.title: Design control, down to the pixel
snapshot.blocks.cta-features.copy.headline: Experience the future of FAQs
snapshot.blocks.cta-features.copy.subheadline: The platform that gets smarter with every interaction. Built for the AI era.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.0.body: Ship in new languages without a translation project. Keep the experience consistent everywhere.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.0.title: Instant localization
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.1.body: Support right-to-left languages without redesigning layouts. Directionality stays correct.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.1.title: RTL ready
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.2.body: Adapt tone and phrasing for the audience, not just the words. The content reads natural.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.2.title: Locale-aware copy
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.3.body: Structured content that can be indexed when you need it. Make answers discoverable.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.3.title: SEO foundations
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.4.body: Strict contracts prevent drift. Changes are explicit, auditable, and repeatable.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.4.title: Governance
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.5.body: Fast renders and sensible loading so the page stays smooth across devices and networks.
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.items.5.title: Performance
snapshot.blocks.global-moat.copy.title: Global by default
snapshot.blocks.hero.copy.headline: Why the FAQ widget beats Elfsight, Typeform, and custom-built
snapshot.blocks.hero.copy.subheadline: Built from scratch for AI. Works globally. Grows virally. One FAQ, infinite possibilities.
snapshot.blocks.page-meta.copy.description: Everything you need to ship AI-powered FAQs that work globally and grow virally.
snapshot.blocks.page-meta.copy.title: FAQ features - Clickeen
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.0.body: Lightweight embeds and lazy loading. No layout jank.
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.0.title: Fast
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.1.body: Deterministic contracts and build gates keep shipping safe at scale.
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.1.title: Reliable
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.2.body: Clear hierarchy, readable type, and interaction patterns that work across input methods.
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.items.2.title: Accessible
snapshot.blocks.platform-strip.copy.title: Built like a platform
snapshot.blocks.split-ai-editing.copy.headline: AI editing: describe, done
snapshot.blocks.split-ai-editing.copy.subheadline: Tell it what you want in plain English. 'Make the questions more casual' or 'add a section about pricing.' AI understands and executes instantly.
snapshot.blocks.split-composable.copy.headline: Composable everywhere: one FAQ, infinite contexts
snapshot.blocks.split-composable.copy.subheadline: Same FAQ works in website, email, landing pages, ads. One source, infinite possibilities.
snapshot.blocks.split-global.copy.headline: Global instant: any language, now
snapshot.blocks.split-global.copy.subheadline: Geography is a parameter, not a project. Add Spanish, Japanese, or Arabic with one click. No manual translation, no delays.
Website URL → personalized content in 29 languages instantly. No manual translation, no translator costs. AI understands your business context.
Start with a curated template OR define everything yourself—your choice, total freedom. No compromises, no limitations.
One FAQ works everywhere: website, email, landing pages, ads. Same content, infinite contexts. No rebuilding for each channel.
snapshot.blocks.steps-differentiators.copy.title: Why Clickeen changes everything
snapshot.blocks.steps-ecosystem.copy.items.0.body: Describe changes naturally. 'Make it more professional' or 'add urgency to the CTA.' AI executes perfectly.
snapshot.blocks.steps-ecosystem.copy.items.1.body: AI handles localization, support, and marketing across all markets simultaneously.
snapshot.blocks.steps-ecosystem.copy.items.2.body: Every user interaction teaches the AI system, making all FAQs smarter over time.
snapshot.blocks.steps-ecosystem.copy.items.3.body: Free FAQs become marketing channels that automatically drive acquisition.
snapshot.blocks.steps-ecosystem.copy.subhead: A complete platform that gets smarter with every interaction.
snapshot.blocks.steps-ecosystem.copy.title: How Clickeen's AI ecosystem works
